name: Tachyum
membership: Slovak Republic (member of EU) government's Innovation Advisory Board, member of the IDC Technical Computing Advisory Panel, the Forbes Technology Council, contributor to TechTarget

goal: Tachyum is semiconductor company designing and manufacturing high performance data processing chips for hyper-scale datacenters, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and supercomputing applications.
